data.title: The Hong Kong Life Sciences Scholarship Awards 2024/25 is now open for nomination! This Award encourages outstanding undergraduate students...
data.meta_description:
16 likes, 0 comments - hklifesciencessociety on June 6, 2024: "The Hong Kong Life Sciences Scholarship Awards 2024/25 is now open for nomination! This Award encourages outstanding undergraduate students to pursue a life sciences or biomedical science program in a UGC-funded institution.

Each of the awardees will receive a scholarship of HK$50,000 with other complimentary entitlements, including the access to our Mentorship Scheme and priority in enrolling on our Summer Internship Program in Hong Kong, Shenzhen or Shanghai.

üìö Learn more about the Scholarship Awards: Link in bio
